features: Three Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside for All-Round Protection --- The X25 Pro is a triple channel dash cam,offer 170° front camera,140° cabin inside camera and 165° rear camera.The Dash camera can simultaneously monitor front, rear and interior of your vehicle while providing audio at 1080P front video + 720P cabin inside video + 720P rear video,keep a video of your potential accidents and responsibilities,give you all-round protection.

Dash Camera for cars with 64GB Card --- MPORTANT:❎NO Wireless,NO APP,NO WIFI,NO GPS,NO Bluetooth.The dash camera comes with a 64GB Card,you don't need to buy separately.Support high speed Class 10 or above,up to 64GB card.Please format all the new card when you first use.The dash cam front and rear inside camera is ideal for rideshare drivers such as Uber, Lyft, and Taxi.

Dashcam with Super Infrared Night Vision & IR Cabin Light --- The car dash cam is equipped with F2.0 large aperture + 4pcs IR LED lights + professional WDR + HDR technology,ensure full HD recording during day and night,accurately captures driver and passengers even in complete darkness.Note ➡️ You can find “Shooting Sound” to turn on/off Night vision function.“ON”--the view of uber camera inside car will turn gray;“OFF”--Display normal color.

Auto Save Emergency Lock Video & Loop Recording --- The Car cameras recording front and rear is built-in G-sensor function,activated emergency recording automatically captures unexpected driving incidents and protects the recordings.Also car camera - dash cam front and rear supports loop recording function to continuously record and automatically delete the oldest stored video to record the latest video when the memory is full.

Dash Cam with Parking Mode & Motion Detection --- When X25 Pro detects a collision, dash cams will automatically power on and start recording protected video. 24 Hours Recording-If you need dash cam front and rear 24/7 recording,please buy hardwire kit separately. We suggest some important function settings for your daily use: level of gravity sensor--"Low", or turn it off; Loop recording--"3 minutes"; motion detection--“Off”; parking monitor--"ON".

Easy to install Portable & Hidden dashcams --- This mini dashcam uses a 2.0-inch LCD high-definition display, which can be well hidden on the windshield and will not hinder your driving vision. The plug-and-play dash cam can automatically record for you.

Installation of Dash Cam Suction Cup Mount --- For dash cam suction cup mount ,Pls follow Step➡️ 1️⃣Remove protective film from Suction Cup Mount 2️⃣ Clean the front windscreen,make suction cups of bracket fit windscreen fully 3️⃣ Clockwise Rotate button of suction cup,icon of “LOCK ”will vertical suction cup with ticking sound.[If your suction cup broken,pls contact seller for replacement.]

Installation of Rear Cameras --- Rear Dash Cam Cable : 📌Way 1: Connect the red part of rear camera cable with the positive pole of reversing light, so that it will appear reversing mode when you parking, No recording when you reversing. 📌Way 2: If your car already have built in reversing system monitor, NO NEED TO CONNECT THE RED WIRE, Just wrap it directly with tape. Install and hide the cable is ok! At this period, the rear camera can keep recording at reversing period.

Guarantee of Milerong Dashcams for Cars --- Support lifetime after-sales +1 YEAR warranty (the Memory Card,Car Charger,Suction Cup broken for free replace)+7*24 hours technical service.If you have any questions about car dash camera for cars front and inside,Pls contact our customer service team via Amazon and the after-sales email on the manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Milerong X25 Pro 3 CHANNEL DASH CAM FRONT AND REAR INSIDE Warm Notice for you to use dashboard camera for cars first time and daily!!! ✖️ NO Wireless,NO APP,NO WIFI,NO GPS,NO Bluetooth. ✔️If your dash cam is recording, please press “OK” to pause the recording first, if not you can‘t enter the menu to setting,All buttons will not work. 1.Format Memory Card 64GB Memory card has inserted in the dashboard camera. Please Format Card firstly: Find the option of “Format” in dashcam and click “OK” button.In general,Due to you have turned on the funtion of parking montior and G-Sensor, it will acuse too many locked files.To meet your daily needs,you should format the recorder once a month. 2.Keep charging all the time When you first use cameras for cars,please use original car charger for 60mins until fulled. Also,please always keep the camera plugged into the car's cigarette lighter. Because the internal battery is only support auto turn on and recording a short time for the urgent situation when you parking. 3.Need to record for 24Hours The X25 car cameras has a built-in battery as an internal power source for emergency recording. If you want to keep the camera keep recording for 24 hours Parking Monitor, Please buy hardwire kit separately. 4.Need to turn on/off inside camera The X25 uber camera dual camera with front and inside camera.You can turn on/off the inside car camera.Please press “M”to find “Internal switch”.When you set ”OFF“,the inside camera will turn of and no recording.And the dash cam will restart.When you set ”ON“，the inside car camera will record normal. IMPORTANT!!!! ✔️ When you meet the freeze or other little problem of interior car camera,you can use the needle to insert the little hole on the " RE" button.

Regarding any product in our store, we will be responsible for solving the after -sales problem for you. When you need help, you can contact Milerong-we will provide you with 100%satisfactory support!Milerong X25 dash cam front and cam includes motion detection, G-sensor and parking monitor function. For example: When dashcam for cars turned on parking protection under full electricity, if there is a collision, the recorder will automatically start the record. The recording time is about 20-30 seconds, and the recording will be started again if there is a collision again. -20 parking protection.

Dash Cam Multiple Screen Switching The dashcam connection power will immediately start recording and press the '' OK Button '' to stop recording. Switch the lens to press the '' Upper Button '' to switch. You can continuously switch the Front Rear and Inside Camera, or the front and rear lenses, and the front -to -rear lens is recorded together. Meet multiple records of daily records.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: Great Dash Cam, it works as expected and was easy to install and operate. There are a few things worth mentioning - both cameras are great during the day, however as with other cameras there is a challenge capturing a moving liscense plate more than a car length away. The nighttime video is great unless there is a light nearby and then the quality decreases somewhat - this seems to be an issue with any camera. For the price this seems to do the job quite nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars pretty decent, lacking license plate readability, easy enough to set up, nice manual
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: I have tried six times over two months to get pictures added to my review, but Amazon keeps denying them for unknown reasons and they will not respond to my support requests about it. Sorry there's no pictures to see what I'm talking about.It's a really interesting kit that sounds great on paper. I also noticed that the really long power cable is made with a super nice, supple, and thick coating! The cable for the third/rear camera is pretty typical PVC stiffer coating, but also fairly nice.As with so many dash cams, the forward facing and rear facing cameras cannot give a clear picture of a license plate beyond maybe a car length and a half, possibly two. So far I’m also disappointed with the low light performance despite having WDR turned on, but maybe I need to fiddle with the settings to get it to do a bit better. My Flex is pretty long and I’m having issues figuring out how to run the cable for the rear camera as it isn’t long enough to route very nicely. The video quality is also not stellar for the rear and looks worse than the front cam facing cam. The interior cam has the worst quality by far, but for the most part should get the job done.Generally setting it up and going with a SanDisk industrial microSD card was simple enough. The suction mount for the cam seems quite stable and has held for over a month with no signs of letting loose despite the camera being in the hot sun often. The manual and accessories are quite good overall. I feel like it’s a nice intro level triple cam setup, but really would like a little more clarity on license plates. I did find it a bit odd that the file types vary depending on the camera. The front and inside are MOV while the rear cam is AVI format.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup if you don't mind wires
reviews.reviewText: My current car was leased so I haven't pulled trim to hide the wires yet. If I keep the car, I'll install this properly. I currently have the wire propped up over the passenger side mirror and running through the glove box. The instructions were able to guide me to getting the recording mode proper and the SD card is sufficient for a week of my commute. Overall, I feel safer knowing that if something happens, I'll have evidence to show the driver at fault.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Complete Dash Cam Solution!
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam for front, rear, and inside is a winner! Comprehensive coverage and excellent quality. Peace of mind on the road. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good enough for insurance disputes
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this camera for few months now and I can say that it is good enough for insurance claims and disputes among parties but not so good for a hit a run.First the good and the like....> The back-up camera comes with a cable long enough for a standard car but for my truck I needed an extension cable. no big deal and was able to easily find one that worked flawlessly.>The booklet says that the cameras stop recording when you are backing up and have the power lead hooked up for the camera to operate as a back-up camera, but my camera continued to record all three cameras. That is good.> Simple set up and running the cables as desired.> Cost effective way to protect yourself on a tight budget.The Bad...> Sometimes the camera would just stop working for no apparent reason. The first few times this happened I touched the camera and it was hot so I thought this was the reason. But one time in the cool evening the camera stopped working and just gave me the blank screen while i was driving. But the camera was cool when I touched it, so who knows why the camera stopped. The GOOD NEWS is that the camera will reset by itself or you can manually reset the camera (see the booklet for instructions). For "automatic" resetting of the camera without a factory reset I found that I just need to disconnect (pull out the power plug) power to the camera and wait until the camera cools down and then try to reconnect power. Sometimes I just wait overnight and the camera is ready to go the next day with all my previous settings.> I tried two sim cards. One card wrote at about 100mb/s speed (32GB) and the other wrote at 140mb/s speed (256GB). The 140Mb/s gave me a slightly better quality at playback than the slower card. I recommend getting the fastest reading card you can find/use for the best results.BUT the overall quality no matter what card I used was still so so. The camera took great still pictures and the video looked great while the vehicle was stopped, but once the vehicle moves the quality suffers no matter what speed the vehicle was traveling at. Reading details like license plates becomes difficult if not impossible however the camera still recorded with enough clarity to see and determine what is happening.> NIGHT TIME - Forget it. once there is a headlight or street lamp you will not see anything but orbs from the lights. You could still piece events together but it will be difficult with all the light orbs. When there are no light shining at the vehicle then you can see a little of the night events but still not great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this cam for several months now, and everything is working as it should. The cameras are decent quality and can be used to show an accident to the police or car insurance, but just be aware that it won't give you sharp detail from a distance. It's a good product for the price, and I'm happy with mine!
